plot: Bellman Raymond Beck wants to become Manager at Canyon View Resort. He is married to a wealthy resort owner's daughter, but wants to climb the ladder of success on his own, without any help...
title: T I P S
plot_es: Bellman Raymond Beck wants to become Manager at Canyon View Resort. He is married to a wealthy resort owner's daughter, but wants to climb the ladder of success on his own, without any help...
plot_en: Bellman Raymond Beck wants to become Manager at Canyon View Resort. He is married to a wealthy resort owner's daughter, but wants to climb the ladder of success on his own, without any help...
